summary: Defines example CKAN plugins that customize the dataset creation/edit form. One plugin inherits the default form behavior and provides a lightweight utility to retrieve supported package types. The other plugin extends the form by injecting an extra metadata field based on a tag vocabulary, adjusting the schema, rendering a custom template, and exposing configuration options.
business_intent: Show developers how to extend CKAN's dataset form functionality, illustrating both a minimal inheritance approach and a richer implementation that adds custom metadata, integrates tag vocabularies, and manages plugin configuration.
